item.title: Tools
item.description: Apache Guacamole (Clientless remote desktop gateway) Supporting standard remote protocols like VNC, RDP, and SSH. https://guacamole.apache.org/ Google’s Dig webapp (DNS lookup) Tool for interrogating DNS name servers. https://toolbox.googleapps.com/apps/dig/ Obsidian Flexible writing application using markdown, a non-propietary language. https://obsidian.md/
